features: BRIGHTEN, EXFOLIATE, AND RESURFACE: Embrace newfound confidence with the Good Molecules Overnight Exfoliating treatment made with powerful ingredients to reveal your most radiant skin. Renew and resurface while you rest, wake up glowing!

FIGHT BREAKOUTS AND IMPROVE TEXTURE: Notice the difference in your skin! This gentle yet exfoliating treatment targets texture, congestion, clogged pores, enlarged pores, and dullness with a formula designed to bring out the best in your skin.

POTENT FORMULA FOR RADIANT SKIN: Glycolic and lactic acid (AHAs) go to work on the surface of your skin to promote renewal and improved texture, while Salicylic Acid (BHA) works to combat breakouts, blemishes, and irritations.

PERFECT ADDITION TO YOUR BEAUTY REGIMEN: Apply a few drops to clean skin at night up to three times per week. Let sit for several minutes before continuing with your routine. We recommend wearing SPF during the day when using this product.

GENTLE ENOUGH FOR ALL SKIN TYPES: Powerful enough to bring results and gentle enough for regular use; this serum is suitable for all skin types. Our serum has a pH of 3.5, is fragrance-free, vegan, and was never tested on animals.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A gentle overnight exfoliant
reviews.reviewText: It's a great product from my new favorite skincare line, all the products in it are moderately priced ends great value. As for this one it does not leave you red and peeling in the morning but you do feel the effects of the exfoliation. They say they use it three times a week, I have a little tougher skin so I go up to five but I wouldn't recommend that for the normal person

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gentle but effective.
reviews.reviewText: I use this at night a few times a week. I used to use the ordinary lactic acid and liked it but it often upset my skin. I discovered this product and will never go back. My skin is more on the sensitive side and it never causes excess drying or redness. I wake up with soft, happy skin. I love this and it’s definitely one of my holy grail skincare products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: got this for a friend it does burn a bit if you have sensitive skin or inflamed pimples use this once to three times a week depending on how well you skin handles exfoliators.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I am obsessed!!
reviews.reviewText: I was a little skeptical because of the price of the product, but I’ve already noticed that my skin is becoming more even and smooth

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Like the product. I would recommed this 100%. But take care of your skin if you have sensible skin. Do not use every night.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Overnigth exfoliant treatment
reviews.reviewText: Es un exfoliante sutil y eficaz es importante lavarse la cara antes de usarlo y que esté bien seca y después aplicar el serum exfoliante sutilmente

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not a fan
reviews.reviewText: I used this 1-2x week for 2 months. I did feel the burning sensation, as others have mentioned, when first applying the serum to my face. This was tolerable.What has caused me to no longer continue using this product is due to extreme breakout. They started off under my skin..so they hurt, and then would go into full bloom with huge white heads. I havent had pimples that came in clusters like that since 2007. It happened twice, lasting about 1 week each month i used it. This is my first full month not including the serum to my regimen and my skin is slowing going back to normal; with a few dark acne scars to add to it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stings a little at first, but works great
reviews.reviewText: Works great, stings just a little at first. Use a hand fan for 5 seconds and it stops. Love how it helps with exfoliating with out scrubbing skin. Good for mature skin so no tugging.
